messages.subject: translation
messages.msgSnippet: Hello All, Does anyone or could someone provide a translation or at least a good synopsis of the article in Token Bijutsu No. 587 that refers to at the start;
messages.messageBody:
Hello All, Does anyone or could someone provide a translation or at
least a good synopsis of the article in Token Bijutsu No. 587 that
refers to at the start; single edged import (Korean?) swords and ends
the article at hairpin tachi. It looks like an interesting article.
John
